analysis.description:
GridcubePlatformToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/25/0xe600dabd95d181fe5f6eee1b079c2b64aa5fbcc7.sol#133) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0xe600dabd95d181fe5f6eee1b079c2b64aa5fbcc7.sol#243-254)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/25/0xe600dabd95d181fe5f6eee1b079c2b64aa5fbcc7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/25/0xe600dabd95d181fe5f6eee1b079c2b64aa5fbcc7.sol#25): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/25/0xe600dabd95d181fe5f6eee1b079c2b64aa5fbcc7.sol#110-111) is not in mixedCase
